channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Candidates have legal standing to challenge election laws, the Supreme Court rules
item.description: In a case related to Illinois state law about the return of mail ballots, the U.S. Supreme Court says political candidates have the legal standing to ...

item.title: MLK concert held annually at the Kennedy Center for 23 years is relocating
item.description: Georgetown is moving Let Freedom Ring , its annual event celebrating the life of Martin Luther King, Jr., to the historic Howard Theatre in order to s...

item.title: Kitchen countertop workers are dying. Some lawmakers want to ban their lawsuits
item.description: Some safety experts want California to stop the cutting of quartz countertops saying it can't be done safely. Lawmakers, meanwhile, contemplate a ban ...

item.title: Scientists call another near-record hot year a 'warning shot' from a shifting climate
item.description: Scientists calculate that last year was one of the three hottest on record, along with 2024 and 2023. The trend indicates that warming could be speedi...

item.title: Denmark says there's a 'fundamental disagreement' with Trump over Greenland
item.description: The two sides agreed to create a working group to discuss ways to work through differences as President Trump continues to call for a U.S. takeover of...

item.title: Why two Canadian provinces are in a spat over Crown Royal whisky
item.description: The UK-owned, Canadian-made whisky is testing a united "Team Canada" approach in the face of US tariffs.

item.title: U.S. says it's moving into next phase of Gaza peace plan, warns Hamas
item.description: Steve Witkoff said the U.S. expects Hamas to immediately return the final deceased hostage as part of its obligations under the deal.

item.title: Trump admin. cuts grants for mental health, addiction treatment programs
item.description: The U.S. Substance Abuse and Mental Health Services Administration, SAMHSA, lost around $1.9 billion in federal grants, which were abruptly terminated...

item.title: Trump says "killing in Iran is stopping," with "no plan for executions"
item.description: Potentially thousands have died from the crackdown to quash unrest amid protests.

item.title: What Americans think about Trump’s military intervention abroad, according to a new AP-NORC poll
Uganda election chief says he has had threats over results declaration
item.description: This follows comments by a presidential assistant that Bobi Wine would not be declared president, even if he wins.

item.title: Brazilian au pair testifies against former employer and lover in double homicide case
Trump administration pauses immigrant visa processing for 75 countries
item.description: The pause starting on 21 January will bar foreign nationals who 'would take welfare and public benefits.'

item.title: US launches phase two of Gaza peace plan with new technocratic government
item.description: It includes the establishment of a technocratic Palestinian government, as well as the reconstruction and demilitarisation of Gaza, US envoy Steve Wit...

item.title: FBI searches home of Washington Post journalist for classified documents
item.description: The FBI's search is part of a probe into a federal employee suspected of mishandling classified information, Attorney General Pam Bondi said.

item.title: "Fundamental" differences remain over Greenland's future, Denmark says after U.S. meeting
item.description: After the meeting, Denmark's foreign minister said they're eager to work with the U.S. while respecting the "red lines of the Kingdom of Denmark."

item.title: 'Appropriate and unambiguous': White House defends Trump over middle-finger gesture at heckler
item.description: Thousands of people have sent donations totalling nearly $700,000 (£521,000) to the heckler, who was suspended from his job at Ford.

item.title: No immediate court decision on a request to stop the immigration crackdown in Minnesota
